synopsis.text: Ministry of Defense on the colonized planet Eden is developing a transformative, super-stealth aircraft to counter alien threats in 2040. The project's test pilot, Isamu Dyson, is a charismatic and daring jet fighter. However, his old rival, Guld Bowman, is assigned to a competing project, reigniting their long-standing feud. To complicate matters, their mutual ex-girlfriend, Myung Fang Lone, returns, intensifying their rivalry. Meanwhile, the galaxy's top idol, Virturoid Sharon Apple, is set to debut on Eden, but her AI is incomplete, requiring Myung's emotional input. When an unstable and illegal AI technique is installed in Sharon, the situation spirals out of control, endangering humanity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
